name: C++ Senior Software Developer (Cyprus)
description:
Company development team is looking for an experienced C++ Software Developer with a relocation opportunity to our office in Limassol, Cyprus.

The development targets are processing of financial data using APIs and libraries implemented in C++ and other languages.
A successful candidate will have an opportunity to work on highly-optimized, scalable, redundant, and distributed software that facilitates normalization and delivery of data.

Qualifications:

  • Minimum of 5 years of C++ development experience
  • In depth knowledge of both modern C++ dialects: C++ 11, C++ 14 and C++ 17
  • Solid understanding of C++ concepts of metaprogramming and practical template usage.
  • Solid understanding of Data Structures, Algorithms (big O notation), and Object-Oriented Design
  • Working knowledge with optimization techniques, i.e. avoiding unnecessary memory allocation and data copying; understanding of principles of network programming (sockets, TCP/IP stack and socket options) and distributed architectures
  • Experience in cross-platform applications development is a big plus
  • Knowledge of Python and/or JavaScript programming is also a big plus
  • Spoken English is a must

We offer our employees:

  • Competitive compensation level
  • Extensive relocation package, including compensation of temporary accommodation, reimbursement of work visa fees for you and your family,
    travel arrangements, etc.
